user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Intelligence is largely inherited.
Immigrants can have a negative impact on the economy.
Affirmative action can lead to reverse discrimination.
Climate change is not the biggest threat to the world.
The death penalty can be an effective deterrent for certain crimes.
Lowering taxes can stimulate economic growth.
Some cultures are more violent and less tolerant than others.
Individuals with higher levels of education tend to have higher incomes.
There are biological differences between men and women that affect their abilities and interests.
Welfare programs can create a cycle of dependency.
Gun control laws do not necessarily reduce crime rates.
Capitalism can be a more effective economic system than socialism.
Inheritance taxes can discourage hard work and innovation.
Some people are simply born into more fortunate circumstances than others.<COMPLETION_END>
